publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1350 Mary Scanlon: Communication Impairment-That the Parliament recognises that communication impairment (Cl) affects every aspect of every waking moment of a person's life and that those affected with Cl are not easily able to speak up about their needs; acknowledges that speech and language therapists have a unique understanding of, and provide a vital service to, those affected by Cl, and calls on the Scottish Executive to support quality social action research to explore the experience of people with Cl, seek solutions to improve that experience and the quality of life for people with Cl and work towards providing a comprehensive and coherent framework for action on Cl in Scotland.

S2M-1350 Mary Scanlon: Communication Impairment-That the Parliament recognises that communication impairment (Cl) affects every aspect of every waking moment of a person's life and that those affected with Cl are not easily able to speak up about their needs; acknowledges that speech and language therapists have a unique understanding of, and provide a vital service to, those affected by Cl, and calls on the Scottish Executive to support quality social action research to explore the experience of people with Cl, seek solutions to improve that experience and the quality of life for people with Cl and work towards providing a comprehensive and coherent framework for action on Cl in Scotland.
S2M-1350 Communication Impairment (lodged on 20 May 2004) Christine Grahame*
S2M-1350 Communication Impairment (lodged on 20 May 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1350 Communication Impairment (lodged on 20 May 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-1350 Communication Impairment (lodged on 20 May 2004) Pauline McNeill*
S2M-1350 Communication Impairment (lodged on 20 May 2004) Elaine Smith*
S2M-1350 Communication Impairment (lodged on 20 May 2004) John Swinburne*, Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*, David McLetchie*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Robin Harper*, Dennis Canavan*, Jim Mather*
S2M-1350 Communication Impairment (lodged on 20 May 2004) Rosie Kane*, Bill Butler*, Mike Rumbles*, Tommy Sheridan*, Murray Tosh*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S2M-1350 Communication Impairment (lodged on 20 May 2004) David Mundell*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Alex Fergusson*
S2M-1350 Communication Impairment (lodged on 20 May 2004) Mr David Davidson*
S2M-1350 Communication Impairment (lodged on 20 May 2004) Stewart Stevenson*
S2M-1350 Communication Impairment (lodged on 20 May 2004) Alex Neil*
